Accounting Solutions You Can Trust.

Whether you are an individual or a business, local or international, you need reliable and professional accounting services to manage your finances and taxes.

Expertise. Commitment. Value.

01 Tax Preparation.

We prepare everything you need for tax return.

02 Startup Package.

We build financial models you can pitch to your investors.

03 Wealth Management.

We deliver thoughtful investment advisory services.

About us

Established in 1992, Werkn is full service firm, offering affordable accounting solutions to individuals and local and international businesses.

We have a team of qualified and experienced accountants who can handle any accounting task, from bookkeeping and payroll to auditing and tax preparation. We also use the latest technology and software to ensure accuracy and efficiency in our work

With us, you can focus on your core activities and goals, while we take care of your accounting needs. You can also enjoy peace of mind knowing that your financial records are in good hands and compliant with the relevant laws and regulations.

"Accounting is our expertise. We'll take care for it, so you can focus on yours."
- ceo Martin Lightwood

At werkn, we believe that accounting should be simple, transparent, and affordable. That‚Äôs why we offer flexible pricing plans that suit your needs and budget. You can choose from three plans:

Starter

This plan is ideal for freelancers and sole traders who need basic accounting services. For only R199 per month, you get access to our online accounting software, unlimited invoices and receipts, bank reconciliation, tax calculation, and quarterly financial reports.

Standard

This plan is perfect for small businesses and non-profit organizations who need more comprehensive accounting services. For only R399 per month, you get everything in the Starter plan, plus payroll and compliance, VAT filing, annual financial statements, and business advisory.

Premium

This plan is designed for medium-sized businesses and organizations who need full-service accounting solutions. For only R599 per month, you get everything in the Standard plan, plus audit and assurance, tax planning and optimization, cash flow analysis, and dedicated account manager.

#üìù All our plans come with a üÜìüóìÔ∏è30-day free trial and no long-term contracts. You can cancel or change your plan anytime. You can also add extra services such as bookkeeping, consulting, or training for an additional fee.

Our testimonials

What Customers say...
